title: Goose data timeseries
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
#'load knitr
library(knitr)

#'suppress all code output but run code
opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
opts_knit$set(root.dir = "~/git/thesis/code")
```

```{r import_data}
#'load geese and fams
geese = read.csv("geese.csv")
fams = read.csv("fams.csv")

geese$time = as.POSIXct(geese$time)
geese = geese[complete.cases(geese$time),]

#'remove outlier flock
geese = geese[-which(geese$juvs == max(geese$juvs,na.rm = T)),]
```


```{r try_xts, warning=FALSE}
library(xts)
geese_ts = xts(geese, order.by = geese$time)

plot(geese_ts[,4])
```

```{r stlplus_flock}
#'stlplus on flock size
zoo(flock_xts)
```
